languages.text: "О, я знаю, к чему этот разговор! Сначала я соглашусь с правдоподобной лестью, а потом — раз! — и ты уже муштруешь меня, словно боевого пса".
"Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."
languages.original_text: "О, я знаю, к чему этот разговор! Сначала я соглашусь с правдоподобной лестью, а потом — раз! — и ты уже муштруешь меня, словно боевого пса".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."
"Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

"Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."
"Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

languages.text: 「ああ、なるほど。そういう流れってわけね！うまいお世辞でアタシを乗せておいて、気がついたらまるで言うことを聞かない犬みたいに怒鳴られているパターンね」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、なるほど。そういう流れってわけね！うまいお世辞でアタシを乗せておいて、気がついたらまるで言うことを聞かない犬みたいに怒鳴られているパターンね」

languages.text: "Ha, ich weiß, was Ihr vorhabt! Ihr ködert mich mit der überzeugenden Schmeichelei, und ehe ich's mich versehe, werde ich angeschrien wie ein ungehorsamer Hund."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

traits.locale_text: "Ha, ich weiß, was Ihr vorhabt! Ihr ködert mich mit der überzeugenden Schmeichelei, und ehe ich's mich versehe, werde ich angeschrien wie ein ungehorsamer Hund."

languages.text: « Oh, j'ai compris votre petit manège ! Vous m'amadouez avec ces flatteries très convaincantes, et avant que je comprenne ce qui m'arrive, je me fais crier dessus comme un chien désobéissant. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, j'ai compris votre petit manège ! Vous m'amadouez avec ces flatteries très convaincantes, et avant que je comprenne ce qui m'arrive, je me fais crier dessus comme un chien désobéissant. »

languages.text: «¡Oh, yo ya sé cómo acaba esto! Primero me engatusa con esos halagos tan convincentes, y cuando quiera darme cuenta me estará gritando como a un perro desobediente».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, yo ya sé cómo acaba esto! Primero me engatusa con esos halagos tan convincentes, y cuando quiera darme cuenta me estará gritando como a un perro desobediente».

languages.text: “噢，这套话术我可太熟了！你想说些好话让我上钩，可要是我真信了，你接下来就要大喊大叫，像教训不听话的猎犬一样了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

traits.locale_text: “噢，这套话术我可太熟了！你想说些好话让我上钩，可要是我真信了，你接下来就要大喊大叫，像教训不听话的猎犬一样了。”

languages.text: "Hop, ağır ol! Beni yağlayıp safına çekeceksin, sonra bir bakmışım ki itaatsiz bir köpek gibi fırça yiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I see where this is going! You lure me in with the convincing flattery, and before I know it I'm being yelled at like a disobedient hound."

traits.locale_text: "Hop, ağır ol! Beni yağlayıp safına çekeceksin, sonra bir bakmışım, itaatsiz bir köpek gibi fırça yiyorum."
